title: Name this font
content:
Could anybody tell me the name of this font?  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/21040707@N04/5264663006](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181324/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/21040707@N04/5264663006 "http://www.flickr.com/photos/21040707@N04/5264663006")

I would love to purchase it for a food truck branding design I am currently working on but have no idea what it's called. I have a looming deadline for this thing and this is basically my dream font for the project. Any help would be much appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181324im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen-Shot-2014-09-04-at-5_4899.21.49-PM.jpg)
author: fecundone

comments.content: It has gradients in it—No font can do that naturally.
